delutanFeaturedTextContent.en: We rarely have an opportunity to build our marriages. Often we get cought up in the daily toil of tasks and we do not have quality time with our spouse and/or our children. This afternoon event is dedicated to helping fostor this quality time and growth. It will be organised quarterly in Vigad√≥. During the lectures, we will provide separate supervision for children, where we teach them about the love of God through biblical stories.
